welcome.title: Welcome to ClipBook
welcome.description: ClipBook stores everything you copy and lets you quickly access your clipboard history whenever you need it.

accessibility.title: Enable Accessibility Access
accessibility.description: To paste directly to other applications, allow ClipBook to access the accessibility features of your Mac in System Settings.

enjoy.description: ClipBook is running in the background. You can access your clipboard history using the ⇧Shift + ⌘Cmd + V global shortcut, or by clicking the ClipBook icon in the menu bar and selecting Open ClipBook.

sidebar.managedByOrganization: Some settings are managed by your organization.

automaticUpdates.title: Automatic updates
automaticUpdates.description: Download and install new updates when available.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Change how ClipBook looks on your device.

language.title: Language
language.description: Change the language used in the user interface.

openWindow.title: Open window at
openWindow.description: Select where the ClipBook window should be opened if it's possible.

descriptions.lastLocation:
ClipBook window remembers its position on each screen and opens at
the last position on the active screen.
descriptions.activeScreenCenter: Open at the center of the active screen.
descriptions.activeWindowCenter:
Open at the center of the active window. If there is no active window,
then open at the center of the active screen.
descriptions.screenWithCursor: Open at the center of the screen where the mouse pointer is located.
descriptions.mouseCursor: Open near the mouse pointer location.
descriptions.inputCursor:
Open near the current text caret location. If the caret location cannot
be determined, then open at the center of the active window.

playSound.title: Play sound
playSound.description: Play a sound when an item is added to the history.

showIcon.title: Show icon in menu bar
showIcon.description: Display the ClipBook app icon in the menu bar.
showIcon.hint: You can always open Settings by pressing ⌘, inside the ClipBook window.

updateHistoryAfterAction.title: Update history after paste/copy
updateHistoryAfterAction.description: Move the item to the top of the history list after paste or copy action.

pasteOnClick.title: Paste on click
pasteOnClick.description: Select history item on mouse over and paste on click.

doubleClick.title: On double click
doubleClick.description: Select action for double click on history item.

numberAction.title: On command number shortcut ⌘1-9
numberAction.description: Select action for the command number shortcut ⌘1-9.

copyAndMerge.title: Copy and merge
copyAndMerge.description: Press <kbd>⌘</kbd><kbd>C</kbd><kbd>C</kbd> to append the currently selected text to the previously copied text in the clipboard history.

copyAndMergeSeparator.title: Copy and merge separator
copyAndMergeSeparator.description: Select how the appended text should be separated from the previously copied text.

copyToClipboardAfterMerge.title: Paste back to system clipboard
copyToClipboardAfterMerge.description: Automatically copy the merged text to the system clipboard after merging.

treatDigitNumbersAsColor.title: Treat 8-digit number as a color
treatDigitNumbersAsColor.description: Treat 8-digit, 6-digit, 4-digit, and 3-digit numbers as a hex color code.

showPreviewForLinks.title: Show preview for links
showPreviewForLinks.description: Fetch and display a favicon, title, description, and social card image for links.

warnOnClearAll.title: Warn when clearing entire history
warnOnClearAll.description: Display a confirmation dialog when clearing entire clipboard history.

keepFavoritesOnClearAll.title: Keep favorites when clearing entire history
keepFavoritesOnClearAll.description: Do not remove items market as favorite when clearing entire clipboard history.

clearHistoryOnQuit.title: Clear entire history on quit
clearHistoryOnQuit.description: Clear the entire clipboard history when ClipBook is terminated.

clearHistoryOnMacReboot.title: Clear entire history on Mac shutdown/restart
clearHistoryOnMacReboot.description: Clear the entire clipboard history on Mac shutdown/restart.

ignoreConfidentialContent.title: Ignore confidential content
ignoreConfidentialContent.description: Do not save passwords and other sensitive data copied to the clipboard.

ignoreTransientContent.title: Ignore transient content
ignoreTransientContent.description: Do not save data temporarily placed to the clipboard.

ignoreApps.title: Ignore applications
ignoreApps.description: Do not save content copied from the following applications.

license.title: ClipBook License
license.trialDescription: You are currently using a trial version of ClipBook. To continue using ClipBook, please purchase a license key from online store and activate it.
license.licenseKeyDescription: You can find your license key in the email you received after purchasing ClipBook.

activationErrorMessage.title: The license key cannot be activated :(

checkForUpdatesResult.restartClipBookToInstallUpdate: Restart ClipBook to install the update.

expired.title: Your trial has ended :(
expired.description: I hope you enjoyed using ClipBook. If you like it, please consider supporting the development by purchasing a license.
expired.feedback: If you don't like it, please let me know why.
